emotion: I had to go to work after a sunny day. However

text: While shopping at the grocery store

text: My coffee at home was a bit cold

I ordered pizza for lunch. However
column4: and the pizza arrived cold. This situation made me quite angry and left me hungry.

text: The chicken dish my mom made for dinner tonight was really amazing. The chicken was tender and delicious. This dinner made me very happy.
